citations.desc: Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being.
citations.narrative:
The facility does not have a species-appropriate plan to promote the psychological wellbeing of birds that addresses all of
the required components established by this subpart. Research facilities must develop, document, and follow a plan for
environmental enhancement that addresses social grouping and social needs, enrichment of the physical environment,
special behavioral needs, and restraint. The plan must be documented, approved by the attending veterinarian, followed
by facility staff, and available to APHIS officials on request.
To be corrected by developing, documenting, and following a species-appropriate environment enhancement plan to
promote the psychological wellbeing of birds used for regulated purposes. Correct by November 1st, 2024.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n

narrative:
3.154 
   
Environment enhancement to promote psychological well-being. 
The facility does not have a species-appropriate plan to promote the psychological wellbeing of birds that addresses all of 
the required components established by this subpart. Research facilities must develop, document, and follow a plan for 
environmental enhancement that addresses social grouping and social needs, enrichment of the physical environment, 
special behavioral needs, and restraint. The plan must be documented, approved by the attending veterinarian, followed 
by facility staff, and available to APHIS officials on request.  
 
To be corrected by developing, documenting, and following a species-appropriate environment enhancement plan to 
promote the psychological wellbeing of birds used for regulated purposes. Correct by November 1st, 2024. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
